system.damageOrEffect:
Ignores Natural Armour, Inflicts Righteous Fury on 9 or 10. Gives Tearing Quality if weapon doesn't have it. +1 Damage vs Hordes.
If used with Heavy Bolter, change RoF to S/-/- and give Blast(3) Quality.

description.value:
Damage/Effect: Ignores Natural Armour, Inflicts Righteous Fury on 9 or 10. Gives Tearing Quality if weapon doesn't have it. +1 Damage vs Hordes. If used with Heavy Bolter, change RoF to S/-/- and give Blast(3) Quality.

Qualities: Tearing, Blast (3)(Conditional)
